body_html: I think that install_requires affects wheel installs, causing pip to install the needed dependencies before installing the wheel. It can be moved to requirements.txt as well, though I think requirements.txt is simply convention and not used by pip itself
body_text: I think that install_requires affects wheel installs, causing pip to install the needed dependencies before installing the wheel. It can be moved to requirements.txt as well, though I think requirements.txt is simply convention and not used by pip itself
body: I think that install_requires affects wheel installs, causing pip to install the needed dependencies before installing the wheel. It can be moved to requirements.txt as well, though I think requirements.txt is simply convention and not used by pip itself
